reg_info.act_under: Emergency Management and Civil Protection Act

content.content: 1. The terms of this Order are set out in Schedule 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The terms of this Order are set out in Schedule 1.

content.content: 2. This Order applies as of 12:01 a.m. on April 8, 2021. SCHEDULE 1
content.raw_html:
2. This Order applies as of 12:01 a.m. on April 8, 2021.

SCHEDULE 1

content.content: 1. (1) Every individual shall remain at the residence at which they are currently residing at all times unless leaving their residence is necessary for one or more of the following purposes:
